title: MAXIMIZE Your Urban Farm Yields with These Proven Strategies!

subtasks: Exposing secret hacks to supercharge urban garden
Implementing container gardening with deep, wide containers
Practicing companion planting (e.g., tomatoes and basil)
Utilizing vertical farming techniques (e.g., walls, fences)
Employing drought-resistant watering methods (e.g., drip irrigation)
Applying mulch to retain soil moisture and suppress weeds
Managing pests with natural predators (e.g., ladybugs)
Rotating crops to maintain soil health
